name: NETXP LINUX Data Compression Commands used
description: Monitors commands related to data compression, providing visibility into potential data manipulation activities. This rule covers common compression utilities like zip, gzip, tar, and bzip2. Detection of such activities is crucial for identifying attempts to modify or hide sensitive data.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "Data_Compressed" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
